name: The Eventful Day of a Game Streamer
name_original: The Eventful Day of a Game Streamer
description:
Main character, Streamer Kim has become a famous streamer after years of effort.

If there's one thing he's missing- maybe a girlfriend?

Then one day, he meets a beautiful viewer. What kind of relationship do Streamer Kim and her have...?

■Game length 20 ~ 30 min.
■Recommended for players who want to play a game that makes them feel like they're reading a comic book.
